title: What can be done to prevent agressive campaign helpers from approaching curbside voters after they have pulled into their cubside parking space (which equates to their voting booth) even though it is beyond the 50 foot barrier?
text:
Concerns about polling place privacy violations can be taken up with
the New Hanover County Board of Elections (in New Hanover County) at:
http://www.nhcgov.com/AgnAndDpt/ELCT/Pages/DeptInfo.aspx
